dict.acceptation: 好像，仿佛；似乎；装作；看来好像；

sent.orig: And it doesn't seem to matter, and it doesn't seem right.
sent.trans: 这看似无关紧要，这好象不太应该。

sent.orig: They couldn't seem to recover from the shock, they couldn't seem to pull themselves together.
sent.trans: 受了这个打击，他们就再也恢复不过来，再也振作不起来了。

sent.orig: Doesn't that seem ridiculous to you? Doesn't that seem absurd?
sent.trans: 难道这些你不觉得可笑么？难道这些不荒谬么？

sent.orig: Standards will seem unnecessary high; rigor will seem unwarranted.
sent.trans: 标准会显得没必要的高，严格程度也会显得没道理。

sent.orig: I seem to be misunderstood by everyone; I can't seem to learn these Chinese characters.
sent.trans: 我感觉好像被每个人误解了；我感觉好像不能学这些汉字。
